name: Villager
text: You should know the truth then… We weren’t always here. We lived in the capital once. Had a temple, had favor. But when they cast us out, we lost everything.

name: Villager
text: …Our god—he… demanded offerings. Without them, the sickness came. So we made a deal… We gave the dead to the lake.

name: Choose:
text:
And my mentor? What happened to him? -- (Press A)
You brought this on yourselves. -- (Press B)
